alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marion and Baxter Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Price Place to 7 miles northwest of Maumee. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Norfork... Salesville... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Lakeway... Bull Shoals State Park... Herron... Colfax... Advance... Cartney... Norfork Dam... Diamond Bay... Ozark Regional Airport... Gamaliel Landing... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
